snippet.title: Miniatures - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Miniatures on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2428840/Miniatures/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement

Miniatures is a playable short-story collection with four graphical adventures. Explore, interact and watch the world shift.

We’re excited to show you the world of Miniatures in this very first gameplay trailer! Wander through an overgrown house, assemble a curious cabinet and search for snails in the garden.
